episode.title: National Independent Coal Operators' Association v. Kleppe

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the opinions to announce in two consolidated cases, 73-2066, the National Independent Coal Operators Association against the Secretary of Interior, and 74-521, Kleppe, the Secretary of Interior against Delta Mining.

In the first of these two cases, for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit is affirmed.
